review: Hi,my self Sravani k ,my son is aPKD (pyruvate kinase deficiency)patient..2019 June when we visited Revathi Mam she is fantastic doctor so much patience so caring üòämy son need blood transfusions on every 3 rd or 4 th week ..she told us ki everything will going to be good with my son&whenever we meet revathi Mam first she asks how is my champüòämay god bless her vth good health and her family üëçTq so much Mam

review: Regarding friendly  behavior and explaing the disease cause,she also  give suggestions on diet and also the measure which we have to take for the baby's good health as well as his life partner selection etc( hemoglobin typing).

actualy i have pelvic area symtamaticaly pain i was consult one gynac doctor, she ask one urologist dr opinion i had consult urologist he said to my saw the report u should take ct scan .i ask the dr whats my problem he said left kidney swelling reason for mild black stone.presently take treatment but yr haemoglobin below normal  because u immediatly consult haematologist  1yr before blood taken in government hospital at tenkasi.
My appointnent was not confirmed and i wanted for a 21 year old and since she is only for paediatrics. They referred another doctor
